data.name: Gotcha Covered of Colleyville
data.address: 6557 Glenview Dr #1725, North Richland Hills, TX 76180

reviews.text: 6557 Glenview Dr #1725, North Richland Hills, TX 76180 Confirmed by this business 6 weeks ago RQG5+95 North Richland Hills, Texas

Design Tip Tuesday ✨ If you want your room to feel taller and more refined, try hanging your drapery higher. Raising the eyeline creates beautiful visual height and instantly gives the space an airy, architectural elegance—especially when paired with tailored shades. At Gotcha Covered, we help you choose custom window treatments that enhance your home’s natural proportions and complement your personal style—and we’d love to show you what’s possible for your space. "Great quality, great price, and great service." "We enjoyed the entire process from selection to installation." "Quick installation and reasonable price, def recommended"

Jennifer with Gotcha Covered of Colleyville is absolutely amazing!  She was so knowledgeable, kind and patient with us as we weren't exactly sure what we needed.  Jennifer came to our rescue with many fabulous suggestions! We narrowed it … More Response from the owner 3 weeks ago Thank you so much, Cindy!! It was truly a pleasure working with you and Mr. John, and what a bonus that we're also neighbors and now friends! I'm so glad you're happy with your shades!!

We love the new curtains! They have brought so much warmth and coziness to our home. The install was wonderful. Mike and I are very happy. Thank you Jennifer. ❤️ Response from the owner 6 months ago Thank you so much, Ms. Paula! Stephen and I thoroughly enjoyed working with you and getting to know you! I'm so glad you are happy with your new drapes and our service! And thanks for the good review!! :-)

Jennifer was amazing.  She came over measured my windows and ordered the blinds.  She suggested a shutter for one architectural window and a shade for another window. They both turned out beautiful.  She is a jewel and her installers were … More Response from the owner 8 months ago Thank you, Ms. Betty!! I'm so glad you're happy with your blinds, shades and shutters!! I enjoyed getting to know you guys and wish you all the best!
